issue.title: [Python] Python bindings for HiveServer2 client interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3104](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3104). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These will be a 1-1 mapping to the current C++ classes, with support for yielding Arrow record batches or tables
